dialogue.speaker: ZORG
dialogue.text: How's that? Can you hear me better now?

dialogue.speaker: SECRETARY
dialogue.text: Yes, Mr. Zorg, I hear you perfectly! So, how was the concert?

dialogue.speaker: ZORG
dialogue.text: Who gives a shit! I didn't come here to listen to music! Listen up instead of running off at the mouth! The batteries on my phone are almost gone.

dialogue.speaker: ZORG
dialogue.text: Dispatch me another ZFX200 immediately. Someone stole mine.

dialogue.speaker: SECRETARY
dialogue.text: Right away, Sir. I'll send you a new one to the hotel.
